stages.title: Define Your Data Science Vision
stages.description: Clarify your interests in analytics, machine learning, or statistics, and identify target universities.

Global.overview: Top data science programs value strong math/statistics, programming skills, and clear specialization interests.
checklist: Research 5-7 top data science programs (MIT, Stanford, Carnegie Mellon, Cambridge, NUS)
Identify your specialization (ML, analytics, statistics, business intelligence)
Assess your programming and statistics preparation
Create a 3-year roadmap connecting skills, projects, and applications

US.overview: US programs emphasize AP/IB rigor, programming projects, and research.
checklist: Complete AP Statistics and AP Computer Science
Build a portfolio of data analysis projects
Research reach, target, and safety schools

UK.overview: UK programs prioritize A-levels, STEP/MAT, and strong personal statements.
checklist: Review entry requirements for top UK programs
Research UK data science program structures

Asia.overview: Bridge national curricula with global standards.
checklist: Review statistics and programming in national exams
Document interest in data science specializations

quiz.q: What skills are most important for data science?

stages.title: Build Data Science Skills & Projects
stages.description: Develop programming, statistics, and data analysis skills through projects.

Global.overview: Demonstrate data science ability through tangible projects with real datasets.
checklist: Complete 3-5 data analysis projects using real datasets
Learn Python/R and data science libraries (pandas, numpy, scikit-learn)
Participate in Kaggle competitions or data challenges
Create a portfolio showcasing your analyses
projectIdeas: Analyze a public dataset and create visualizations
Build a machine learning model to solve a problem
Create a data dashboard or interactive visualization

US.overview: Link projects to competitions and summer programs.
checklist: Submit project to data science competition
Apply to data science summer programs
Draft EPQ proposal on data science topic

quiz.q: What's the best way to demonstrate data science skills?
opts: Build data analysis projects with real datasets
quiz.correct: Build data analysis projects with real datasets

stages.title: Strengthen Academic Foundation
stages.description: Excel in mathematics, statistics, and programming.

Global.overview: Strong math, statistics, and programming preparation is essential.

checklist: Complete AP Statistics and AP Computer Science

quiz.q: What academic areas are most critical for data science?

stages.title: Craft Your Data Science Narrative
stages.description: Translate your skills and projects into compelling applications.

Global.overview: Connect your data science passion and achievements.
checklist: Highlight data analysis projects and impact
Prepare statements for UCAS and Common App

quiz.q: What should your data science statement highlight?
opts: Analytical passion, data projects, and problem-solving
quiz.correct: Analytical passion, data projects, and problem-solving

stages.title: Final Preparation & Interviews
stages.description: Polish applications and prepare for interviews.

quiz.q: What's key for data science interviews?
opts: Clear explanation of projects and analytical approach
quiz.correct: Clear explanation of projects and analytical approach
